answers.answer: Hi,Personally, I'd want to have an idea from the FNA what might be in store before surgery.  They are a good size and probably should come out (I'm not a Dr., just a patient) since they are on both sides, etc. but IMHO I still would like to know what the FNA provides so you can see if you can try to reduce them in size, etc. and what the timeframe should be .. in other words you can get a 2nd opinion and base it on the facts of the FNA and phys. exam/ultrasound and not just conjecture.C~
